title: The Tragedy of the Pier in Plain Sight (Part 2)

infobox.Title:: The Tragedy of the Pier in Plain Sight
infobox.Japanese title:: 丸見え埠頭の惨劇  (Marumie Futō no Sangeki)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa  Jugo Yokomizo  Futoshi Ejiri  Iwao Ida  Police detective
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Akio Otsuka as Jugo Yokomizo  Keiko Han as Kiriko Shirane  Kazuhiko Kishino as Futoshi Ejiri  Junichi Sugawara as Iwao Ida  Akimitsu Takase as Captain  Bin Shimada as Mineto Kanetani
infobox.Closing song:: Nemuru Kimi no Yokogao ni Hohoemi o

sections.Characters introduced:
- 41 years old
- Fishing enthusiast
- 39 years old
- Fisherman
sections.Situation:
The Detective Boys are out fishing when a man is found to be poisoned.

Conan investigates and with evidence proves who the culprit is.

sections.Trivia: - Although the anime did not reveal Agasa's new age, this case took place on his 53rd birthday.
